Fri, 29 Nov 2024 17:06:00 +0000 Hastings-trained Debbi Harri responds to the urgings of apprentice jockey Jim Chung to win a 1340m maiden race at Whanganui last Saturday. She will back up again at this Saturday’s Whanganui meeting.
